meta.title: AppRevenue — Track All Your App Revenue in One Place
meta.description: Free unified dashboard for tracking AdMob, App Store, Google Play, and Stripe revenue. Real-time analytics for mobile app developers.

hero.subtitle: The unified dashboard that brings together AdMob, App Store Connect, Google Play, and Stripe data. Stop switching between platforms.

features.sectionSubtitle: One dashboard to rule all your revenue streams

items.title: AdMob Analytics
items.description: Track ad revenue, impressions, clicks, and eCPM across all your apps and countries in real time.

items.title: App Store Connect
items.description: Monitor iOS app versions, build statuses, downloads, ratings, and proceeds automatically.

items.title: Google Play Console
items.description: Track Android installs, releases, subscriptions, and revenue from a single view.

items.title: Stripe Payments
items.description: Monitor MRR, ARR, subscriptions, churn rate, and payment analytics in real time.

items.title: CSV & API Export
items.description: Export all your data in CSV or JSON format. Full REST API for custom integrations.

items.title: Automated Collection
items.description: Daily cron jobs collect data automatically. Trigger manual collection anytime you need fresh numbers.

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Up and running in three simple steps

steps.title: Connect Your Accounts
steps.description: Add your API keys for AdMob, App Store Connect, Google Play, and Stripe.

steps.title: Automatic Data Collection
steps.description: Our cron system fetches your revenue data daily. No manual work required.

steps.title: Analyze & Export
steps.description: View unified charts, filter by date range, and export data anytime.

pricing.sectionSubtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more power.

items.question: Is there a free plan?
items.answer: Yes! The Free plan lets you track up to 2 apps with daily data sync at no cost. No credit card required to get started.

items.question: What platforms are supported?
items.answer: We support AdMob (ad revenue), App Store Connect (iOS), Google Play Console (Android), and Stripe (payments and subscriptions).

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your credentials are stored securely and all API communications use encrypted connections. Authentication uses industry-standard JWT.

items.question: Can I add multiple apps?
items.answer: Free users can track up to 2 apps. Pro users enjoy unlimited apps with hourly data sync for just €9/month.

items.question: How often is data collected?
items.answer: Free plan syncs data once daily. Pro plan syncs every hour for near real-time insights. You can also trigger manual collection anytime.

footer.description: Unified revenue tracking for mobile app developers.
